Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete your data? This is irreversible. Please confirm with the buttons below.

This deletion will delete everything shown in /data view all. Historic or relevant data like guild IDs, user IDs, usernames, errors, and similar may remain in logs, blacklists, or similar.

introduction.name: Introduction
introduction.value: NotifHy is a bot focused on alerts and notifications for the Hypixel server. Share logins with friends, get reminders when you are about to lose your daily reward streak, and get alerts on suspicious activity. This bot is the successor to HyGuard, which you can read about [here](https://hypixel.net/threads/discord-bot-hyguard-a-bot-that-monitors-your-account-24-7.4368395/ "Hypixel Forums")

modules.name: Modules
modules.value:
Modules are how different types of notifications are separated. Once you register, simply select and configure the modules you want to use.

‚Ä¢ The Defender Module is an implementation of [HyGuard](https://hypixel.net/threads/discord-bot-hyguard-a-bot-that-monitors-your-account-24-7.4368395/ "Hypixel Forums")
‚Ä¢ The Friends Module sends your login and logouts to a channel to share
‚Ä¢ The Rewards Module sends you a DM reminding you to claim your daily reward

setup.name: Setup
setup.value:
‚Ä¢ Invite the bot by clicking [here](https://attituding.github.io/NotifHy/invite/ "Invite") and granting the OAuth2 scopes
‚Ä¢ Use `/register` followed by your username or UUID
‚Ä¢ Using `/discord` on Hypixel may be required to link or relink your Discord account to your Minecraft account
‚Ä¢ Use `/modules` followed by the module you are interested in
‚Ä¢ Configure the module by clicking on the select menus and buttons. The `Toggle` setting will tell you what settings need to be configured before you can enable the module
‚Ä¢ `/channel` may be required for some modules in order to tell the bot where you want alerts/notifications to go

other.name: Other Information
other.value: Learn more at https://attituding.github.io/NotifHy/ or the GitHub page below

gitHub.name: GitHub
gitHub.value: This application's source code is available at this [GitHub](https://github.com/Attituding/NotifHy "https://github.com/Attituding/NotifHy") page under the MIT license. See the license for more details.

legal.name: Legal Stuff
legal.value: By using this service, you agree to our [Privacy Policy](https://attituding.github.io/NotifHy/privacy/ "Privacy Policy") and our [Terms of Service](https://attituding.github.io/NotifHy/tos/ "Terms of Service")

contact.name: Contact
contact.value: Contact Attituding at attituding@outlook.com or Attituding#6517 on Discord for assistance, bug reports, or suggestions

dm.value: This command cannot be used in a DM channel

owner.value: Being an owner is required to execute this command

defender.title: Defender Module
defender.description: The replacement for HyGuard - get notified on logins, logouts, version changes, and more.

missingConfigField.name: Missing Configuration
missingConfigField.value: You need to configure the following settings before enabling the Defender module: {{ missingRequirements }}. Click on the menu below, select the option(s), and configure it.

toggle.label: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle whether this module is active
toggle.longDescription: Enable or disable this module. However, this module will not be activated if you have not configured it.

alerts.label: Alerts
alerts.description: Select alerts to receive for the defender module
alerts.longDescription: Toggle alerts for the defender module. You can individually toggle each type of notification.

options.label: Login
options.description: Toggle login alerts

options.label: Logout
options.description: Toggle logout alerts

options.label: Version
options.description: Toggle version alerts

options.label: Game Type
options.description: Toggle game type alerts

options.label: Language
options.description: Toggle language alerts

channel.label: Channel
channel.description: Set a channel to send alerts to
channel.longDescription: Set a channel to send alerts to. Due to limitations, you need to set a channel with /channel. You can also choose to leave this field empty; alerts will be sent via Direct Messages instead.

options.label: Disabled
options.description: Disabled

gameTypes.label: Blacklisted Game Type(s)
gameTypes.longDescription: Select blacklisted game type(s). If the bot detects your account playing these games, you will be notified.

languages.label: Whitelisted Language(s)
languages.longDescription: Select whitelisted version(s) for use on Hypixel. If the bot detects you switching to a whitelisted language, it will not alert or notify you. Select none to get a notification on every language change.

versions.label: Whitelisted Version(s)
versions.longDescription: Select whitelisted version(s) of Minecraft. If the bot detects you switching to a whitelisted version, it will not alert or notify you. Select none to get a notification on every version change.

friends.title: Friends Module
friends.description: Know when your friends are online without asking or logging onto Hypixel by sharing logins and logouts with each other. This module sends your logins and logouts to a specified channel; have your friends set this module up to the same channel and share them with each other.

missingConfigField.name: Missing Configuration
missingConfigField.value: You need to configure the following settings before enabling the Friend module: {{ missingRequirements }}. Click on the menu below, select the option(s), and configure it.

toggle.label: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle whether this module is active
toggle.longDescription: Enable or disable this module. However, this module cannot be enabled if you have not configured it.

channel.label: Channel
channel.description: Set a channel to send logins and logouts to
channel.longDescription: Set a channel to send logins and logouts to. Due to limitations, you need to set a channel with /channel.

options.description: Disabled

rewards.description: Never miss a daily reward again - get notifications to claim your daily reward at your convenience!

claimNotification.label: Claim Notification
claimNotification.description: Toggle notifications for when you claim the reward
claimNotification.longDescription: Toggle whether you get a confirmation when you collect the reward. It also comes with your current streak and total daily rewards!

milestones.label: Reward Milestones
milestones.description: Receive a congratulation on achieving streak milestones
milestones.longDescription: Receive a DM congratulating you when you hit a daily streak of 7, 30, 60, 90, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300, 365, 500, 750, or 1000.

notificationInterval.label: Notification Interval
notificationInterval.longDescription: Set how long the bot should wait before pinging you again.

invalid.title: Invalid Input
invalid.description: The username/UUID provided is invalid! The username cannot contain invalid characters. UUIDs must match the following regex: `/^[0-9a-f]{8}[0-9a-f]{4}[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}[89AB][0-9a-f]{3}[0-9a-f]{12}$/i`. You can test this regex with [__this__](https://regex101.com/r/A866mm/1) site.

50013.name: {{ cleanModule }} Disabled

embed.title: System Message
embed.description: You have one or more system messages that require your attention. These are part of this bot's automatic mailbox system. System messages are queued when the bot requires your attention and are sent when you execute a command.

statusAPIMissing.title: Missing Data
statusAPIMissing.description: Your status data was not found. This may be a result of disabling the Online Status API option on Hypixel or setting your social status to offline. Some modules will not work while this data is missing. Once the bot receives your status data, affected modules will automatically resume operation and you will receive another DM.

statusAPIReceived.title: Received Data
statusAPIReceived.description: Your status data was received. Affected modules will now resume operation.
